Type Required In Table: Flowpaths with ef_type=1 (reach flowpaths); ef_type=3 (skeleton flowpaths) optional

Required: In all cases, where flow enters or exits the AOI; sink points within the interior of the AOI may or may not be provided
If the AOI intersects (or covers) all or part of a shoreline
